title: Apple services subscribers grow 25% to new high of 825 million
content:
Apple has been investing a lot in its services recently, as the company now has Apple Music, Apple TV+, Apple Arcade, and other platforms. Luckily for the company, its efforts have been paying off as Apple now has 825 million subscribers across all its services – which is an all-time record.

more…

The post Apple services subscribers grow 25% to new high of 825 million appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple now has 825 million subscribers across all its services – which is an all-time record for the company.
